programme.title: Deadly Disasters
programme.desc: This episode looks at droughts. It is not only a lack of rain and high temperatures that causes drought; overuse of existing water supplies by an ever-increasing population only adds to the problem.

programme.title: Mammals
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the series that explores the most successful animal group on Earth, from the tiny Etruscan shrew to the largest mammal in existence - the blue whale.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark
programme.desc: In this episode, the team journey to Rainbow Reef, where they face their next dive tasks. With some still struggling, theres a long way to go. With training over, and the team split up, Steve takes some for a shallow-water shark experience with the timid black tips, a perfect shark for novices. Meanwhile, Skyla, one of the Bahamian shark saviours, persuades the rest of the UK team to join her rehearsals for the annual Junkanoo, one of the Caribbeans most celebrated carnivals.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley Havannas ja Haitil
programme.desc: Naitlejanna ja saatejuht Joanna Lumley kulastab kaht kõige salaparasemat Kariibi mere riiki, Kuubat ning Haitit, ja tutvustab meile nende peidetud parle. 1. osa: Joanna alustab oma seiklust Havanna poksisaalist ja kuuleb noortelt kuubalastelt, mida nemad arvavad elust Kuubal. Tee viib ka suhkrutoostuse edule ehitatud linnakesse, Hemingway lemmikranda ja Santiago de Cubasse, kus tahistatakse revolutsiooni 60. aastapaeva.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: In Eagle, Andys apprentice makes a costly mistake and runs out of the wood that heats his tent and keeps him alive. In Kavik, Sue pushes her body beyond the limit, and when an old injury flares up she is forced to call in outside help.

programme.title: Kus on metsikud mehed?
programme.desc: Ben travels to Sweden to meet Annalisa, the Italian chose a life on the streets of Europe as a teenager, and now is developing a forest hideaway on the fringes of Swedish society for her and her toddler.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the HSL factory in West Yorkshire to find out how they make more than 5,000 sofas every year. The huge site has 250 staff dedicated to furniture making. Gregg is following the production of one of their best-selling sofas, the Burros Classic in indigo. Cherry Healey learns about the science of light bulbs to create the perfect environment to snuggle up on the sofa and visits a foam factory to see how comfy padding is produced in just a few minutes. Historian Ruth Goodman takes a front row seat to discover the history of the sofa and stitches together the fascinating story of one of the worlds most famous sewing machines.

programme.title: Dunastiad
programme.desc: Patagoonia puumaemale sundis harukordselt suur pesakond. Nelja poja kasvatamiseks peab ta võitlema rivaalidega, murdma endast kolm korda suuremaid saakloomi ja kannatama karmi ilma.

programme.title: Maa
programme.desc: Selles osas jutustab Chris Packham taimede eepilisest võitlusest olemasolu eest. Nende pikk teekond veest maismaale on tais tõuse ja mõõnu, peaaegu havimist ning isearalikke sigitisi, kuni paljast kivist sai lõpuks kosmiliste ja maiste jõudude kiuste roheline haljendav planeet.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley Havannas ja Haitil
programme.desc: Joanna Kuuba reis lõpeb kulaskaiguga kurikuulsasse Guantanamo linna. Teisel pool Tuulepealset vaina asub Haiti, laanemaailma vaeseim riik. Joanna viib meid reisile, kus saab naha nii pisaraid kui ka naeru.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Sue paneb laagri lukku ja suundub lahimasse linna vabaduse jarele. Cody soovib pariselt Alaskasse elama jaada, ent elatist tuleb ikkagi teenida. Esimestel aastatel saab seda Andy arvates teha vaid karusloomi puudes. Kutteõli maksab Noorvikis hingehinda ja Chip otsustab õli põletamise asemel puid teha. Glenn on joogivee saamiseks seni lund sulatanud, aga pesemiseks vajab ta rohkem vett. Kui paksust jarvejaast tuleb tal labi raiuda?

programme.title: Kus on metsikud mehed?
programme.desc: As always, Ben joins a variety of brave folks who chose to venture down a very alternative path to everyday life. The aim is to discover the reality of leaving it all behind, and meet those who have chosen to ditch a life dominated by debts and the daily grind to go in search of something different. This week, Ben journeys to the mountains of Northern Ethiopia to stay with Susan, a native Glaswegian who rejected retirement for this remote region of Africa. Ben learns the harsh realities this former teacher faced when she first arrived, how she embraced a new culture and people, and how she refuses to slow down even at nearly 70. While there, Ben discovers the huge impact Susan has had on the local community—from the set-up of a school to the extraordinary restaurant which she and her business partner took three years to build on a desolate mountain top. From a high priest blessing to market runs and waiting on tables, Ben gets stuck in with the restaurant and the extraordinary landscape that surrounds it.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the Farrow and Ball factory in Dorset to learn how they produce up to 200,000 litres of paint and 10,000 metres of wallpaper a week. They make 270 different coloured paints, but Gregg is learning how they make sulking room pink. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey discovers how a key ingredient in the paint-making process is mined at a huge china clay mine in Devon, and learns the art of hanging wallpaper at a DIY school. Historian Ruth Goodman is in the Lake District exploring the history of wallpaper and visits Portsmouth to uncover the extraordinary story of how ships in the First World War were painted with dazzling patterns to evade German submarines.

programme.title: Dunastiad
programme.desc: Harukordne sundmus seab ohtu Keenias elava elevandipere. Ellujaamiseks peavad kõik pereliikmed pingutama ja koostood tegema.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Jaa on lainud ja Hailstoneid suunduvad paadiga esimesele kevadisele jahiretkele. Talv labi suurte ulukite liha soonud Andy kasutab samuti võimalust varsket liha hankida ja otsustab Fordi jarvel parte ning ondatraid kuttida. Jessie elu keerleb ka kevadel umber koerte ja tood jagub. Koerte elutingimused vajavad parandamist ja tuleb ehitada uus aedik. Glenn asub umbrust uurima ja suundub aladele, mida ta varem ainult kaugelt on nainud.

programme.title: Kus on metsikud mehed?
programme.desc: This week Ben meets the Powell family who are creating a wilderness home and legacy in a Welsh mountain valley; Britains only living cave man Will, 50, who lives a wild existence in rural Suffolk; Philip, 46, a unique islander living on an equally extraordinary island off the coast of Scotland; and Kezz, 43, and Nathalie, 40, alternative woodsmen in Northumberland. Ben wants to discover the reality of leaving it all behind and meet those whove chosen to ditch a life dominated by debts and the daily grind and go in search of something different. Adventurer Ben Fogle journeys to the Black Mountains, Wales, to live with Keith, 53, and Em, 44, and their 4 young sons. They traded their careers as vets for an off-grid existence in a hidden valley. Ben will discover their stunningly designed wild home, the challenges they face and how they are attempting to leave their mark on the world, using the extraordinary land around them. Ben climbs into a ravine to maintain the familys hydro electrics, eats a camp-fire cook-out, goes wild swimming, explores the forest with the spirited kids, and helps plant the biggest new woodland in Wales for a generation.

programme.title: Moodsa aja geniaalsed alustalad
programme.desc: Hannah takes a look at the vacuum cleaners, going behind the scenes with Dyson and discovering how the motor in their latest vacuum spins nine times faster than that of a Formula 1 race car. She finds out why a wheezy janitor in the 1900s took inspiration from a sewing machine to create the first popular, portable vacuum. And she comes face to face with a colony of creepy crawlies whose job is to help us fight the filth.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Alaskan residents look to restock their food supplies as spring brings longer days. This season, the hardy residents face fresh threats to their survival.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the Farrow and Ball factory in Dorset to learn how they produce up to 200,000 litres of paint and 10,000 metres of wallpaper a week. They make 270 different coloured paints, but Gregg is learning how they make sulking room pink. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey discovers how a key ingredient in the paint-making process is mined at a huge china clay mine in Devon, and learns the art of hanging wallpaper at a DIY school. Historian Ruth Goodman is in the Lake District exploring the history of wallpaper and visits Portsmouth to uncover the extraordinary story of how ships in the First World War were painted with dazzling patterns to evade German submarines.

programme.title: Anton and Giovannis Adventures in Spain
programme.desc: Strictly stars and best friends Anton Du Beke and Giovanni Pernice are livin la vida loca as they head to Spain on an epic adventure across Antons motherland. Starting in the south, their road trip takes them through the heart of the country before ending in the north, in the very village where Antons mother was born and raised, a place Anton hasnt visited in over four decades. This landmark trip sees the dancing duo explore the Spain that Anton knew as a child and parts of the country unknown to either of them. In the first leg of their journey, the boys drive across the Andalusian region of the country. After a very dramatic arrival in a hot-air balloon, Anton and Giovanni touch down just outside the regions capital city, Seville. Armed with Antons Spanish mothers list of places to visit, its not long before the boys hit the city famed for its beautiful weather and relaxed vibe. Anton and Giovannis first stop is the Plaza de España. Built in the 20th century, the plaza has become one of the citys most beloved landmarks. It even comes with its very own canal. True to form, as soon as the boys spot the gondolas, a race ensues, with the loser paying for the ice creams. From the plaza, the boys head into Seville. Spotting a shop selling one of Spains most famous accessories, the hand fan, the boys head in and discover a whole secret coded language neither knew existed before. The following morning, the boys set off for Ronda, one of Antons mums suggestions and a town whose "buena vista" makes it one of the most photographed places in Spain. After a day spent cruising on a yacht off the coast of Marbella, Anton and Giovanni get a chance to stretch their legs as they walk the Caminito del Rey, once known as the most dangerous trail in the world. After a long drive, the boys arrive in Granada, home to one of the countrys most visited tourist attractions, the Alhambra, a Unesco world heritage site. From there, they head to the Sacromonte district of Granada. This area is the traditional home of the citys thriving Roma community and the birthplace of flamenco. For Anton and Giovanni, its one of the highlights of the whole trip as flamenco is deeply rooted in Andalusian culture, and this is the best place to see the art form at its purest - the perfect end to the first leg of their adventure.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark
programme.desc: In this episode, part of the team explores the mangroves, which are essential for the survival of some sharks. While there, they come face to face with baby lemon sharks. Back on dry land, the rest of the team are learning more about North Biminis main tourist area - Alice Town. Its a chance for the shark saviours to relax, see the sights and play a quick game of frisbee on the beach before everyone reunites for the next phase of their training.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley Havannas ja Haitil
programme.desc: Joanna Kuuba reis lõpeb kulaskaiguga kurikuulsasse Guantanamo linna. Teisel pool Tuulepealset vaina asub Haiti, laanemaailma vaeseim riik. Joanna viib meid reisile, kus saab naha nii pisaraid kui ka naeru.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Sue paneb laagri lukku ja suundub lahimasse linna vabaduse jarele. Cody soovib pariselt Alaskasse elama jaada, ent elatist tuleb ikkagi teenida. Esimestel aastatel saab seda Andy arvates teha vaid karusloomi puudes. Kutteõli maksab Noorvikis hingehinda ja Chip otsustab õli põletamise asemel puid teha. Glenn on joogivee saamiseks seni lund sulatanud, aga pesemiseks vajab ta rohkem vett. Kui paksust jarvejaast tuleb tal labi raiuda?

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Talking Business
programme.desc: On Talking Business BBC presenters, based in the worlds most dynamic cities, discuss with the most important and influential people from the world of business and finance, the key issues of the day. Corporate leaders, global investors, top creatives, cutting-edge entrepreneurs and leading intellectuals gather together weekly to discuss and analyse the issues and trends that most affect how business has to work in todays world. Our team of presenters are experts on the issues and developments which are shaping the way we work, consume and live in the 21st Century.

programme.title: The Security Brief
programme.desc: In an age defined by uncertainty and rapidly evolving threats, understanding global conflict has never been more important. Former senior officer and assault helicopter pilot in the British military Mikey Kay brings clarity to chaos, offering a unique perspective shaped by three decades of frontline experience. The Security Brief unpacks the most pressing stories in international security, giving you a behind-the-scenes look at everything from the war in Ukraine to the White House. Dig beneath the headlines and hear first-hand accounts from troops serving in combat, senior government figures and spies from MI6, to explore the root causes of conflicts in Europe, Africa, Asia and the Middle East. Featuring exclusive interviews, clever use of graphics and detailed reporting from the field, Mikey connects viewers to the forces shaping todays global landscape. Learn about the latest developments in military innovation, including drone warfare, artificial intelligence and next-generation military capability. Whether youre a policymaker, journalist, student or a curious viewer, The Security Brief offers the insight and context needed to stay informed on some of the worlds most complex issues.

programme.title: Trump
programme.desc: Donald Trumps return to the White House has prompted sweeping change in the US and far beyond. We look at the key developments of this historic period, Mr Trumps role in them and their meaning for the wider world as policies cascade from the White House. Focusing on the presidents announcement of reciprocal tariffs, we consider the developments on the economy, we examine the extraordinary confrontation between Ukraines president, Volodymyr Zelensky, in the Oval Office and analyse key policy developments on Greenland, Canada, immigration and the so-called culture wars. As the world experiences the profound shift under way in US politics, supporters and opponents of Mr Trump tell us their thoughts, and we hear from those who have worked closely with him and tracked his many pronouncements.

programme.title: Valisilma dokk
programme.sub-title: The Truth about Baby Food Pouches
programme.desc: Baby food in plastic pouches has revolutionised the way many parents feed their children. Quick, convenient and in a wide range of flavours, they are marketed as healthy alternatives to homemade food. But as reporter Catrin Nye discovers, some are worryingly low in essential vitamins and minerals, while others contain more sugar than the NHS recommends an infant consumes in an entire day. Six years ago, a report from Public Health England called for a tightening-up of baby food regulation as well as clearer labelling, but successive governments have failed to act. While the companies behind baby food pouches insist they put the well-being of children first, Panorama hears from dieticians, dentists and public health experts who all warn that parents should know the risks of regularly using pouches in place of homemade meals.

programme.title: Talking Business
programme.desc: On Talking Business BBC presenters, based in the worlds most dynamic cities, discuss with the most important and influential people from the world of business and finance, the key issues of the day. Corporate leaders, global investors, top creatives, cutting-edge entrepreneurs and leading intellectuals gather together weekly to discuss and analyse the issues and trends that most affect how business has to work in todays world. Our team of presenters are experts on the issues and developments which are shaping the way we work, consume and live in the 21st Century.

programme.title: Valisilma dokk
programme.sub-title: The Truth about Baby Food Pouches
programme.desc: Baby food in plastic pouches has revolutionised the way many parents feed their children. Quick, convenient and in a wide range of flavours, they are marketed as healthy alternatives to homemade food. But as reporter Catrin Nye discovers, some are worryingly low in essential vitamins and minerals, while others contain more sugar than the NHS recommends an infant consumes in an entire day. Six years ago, a report from Public Health England called for a tightening-up of baby food regulation as well as clearer labelling, but successive governments have failed to act. While the companies behind baby food pouches insist they put the well-being of children first, Panorama hears from dieticians, dentists and public health experts who all warn that parents should know the risks of regularly using pouches in place of homemade meals.

programme.title: Trump
programme.desc: Donald Trumps return to the White House has prompted sweeping change in the US and far beyond. We look at the key developments of this historic period, Mr Trumps role in them and their meaning for the wider world as policies cascade from the White House. Focusing on the presidents announcement of reciprocal tariffs, we consider the developments on the economy, we examine the extraordinary confrontation between Ukraines president, Volodymyr Zelensky, in the Oval Office and analyse key policy developments on Greenland, Canada, immigration and the so-called culture wars. As the world experiences the profound shift under way in US politics, supporters and opponents of Mr Trump tell us their thoughts, and we hear from those who have worked closely with him and tracked his many pronouncements.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. This BBC programme takes you to every corner of the planet, providing an all-round insight into the world of travel. From winter wonderland activities such as eco skiing in Denmark and trekking across glaciers in Iceland, to warmer destinations as diverse as Rwanda and the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, your adventure starts here.

programme.desc: Weekly magazine dedicated to technology and its latest advancements, presented by Anthony Lacavera and Michael Bancroft. Discover the emerging technologies that are impacting and changing our lives rapidly, from artificial intelligence to gene editing and much more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais is convinced that Gumball is being bullied by Tina Rex.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are convinced that the world will end in 24 hours.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is desperate to avoid a late fee on the rented DVD he accidentally destroyed.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Colossus: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isnt wise to upset Hector Elmores resident Giant. / The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Pennys affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwins pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone. / Richard gets a job as a pizza delivery man which worries Nicole when at the same time strange things begin to occur around the neighbourhood. / Gumball Darwin and Anais search for the Watterson family treasure.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are offended when Mom calls them "procrastinators", once shes told them what it means. They promise to take the trash out by the time she gets home. As the clock slowly counts down, they discover that they will go to extraordinary lengths, no matter how inane, to avoid the task in hand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: While performing a school play, Gumball is so nervous about kissing Penny that he accidentally headbutts her and cracks open her shell. They discover that under Pennys shell is an emotional shape-shifting inner self. Pennys father is determined for Penny to keep it hidden but Gumball encourages her to show the world who, or what, she really is.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball receives a scare-email from a freaky ghost and decides to ignore it, despite Darwins advice. / Vice Principal Brown gives Gumball and Darwin the ancient school hamster, Chris Morris, to look after for the weekend. / When Darwin and Gumball reveal how theyd spend their perfect day, Gumball confesses that he would spend it with Penny. / Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Principal Brown gives Gumball and Darwin the ancient school hamster, Chris Morris, to look after for the weekend. However they accidentally leave it at school, and take home a clump of Principal Browns hair instead. Surprisingly they discover it makes an excellent pet! When they realise they have left the real Chris Morris at school, they have to race to find him before their error is discovered.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin and Gumball reveal how theyd spend their perfect day, Gumball confesses that he would spend it with Penny. Darwin gets jealous and sets out to dig some dirt on Penny, hoping it will split them up. Meanwhile Gumball is planning to step his and Pennys relationship up a notch, by proposing marriage!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it. He bans Granny JoJo from ever seeing Louis again. When the kids get caught sneaking Granny Jojo out of the house, Dad challenges Louis to a man-off to prove once and for all who is the man of the house?!!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry. When they call to complain about their late pizza its the final straw for Larry and he quits all of his jobs. Elmores fragile commercial structure collapses and the citizens revert to a more primitive apocalyptic state.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Leslies petals begin falling off he feels like his good looks are fading, Gumball and Darwin use everything they know about style and beauty to try and help him. The only problem is they know nothing about style or beauty. As Gumball and Darwins methods become more extreme, Leslie questions whether hes prepared to make the ultimate sacrifice for beauty.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons fear the worst when they are summoned to a Town Hall meeting, but are pleasantly surprised when theyre offered a brand new house. Until they discover its in a different state! The Mayor of Elmore has decided they are bringing down the real estate value of the entire town so the family have to prove that theyre upstanding members of the community.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. And Dad thinks that grown-ups do. They decide the only way to figure it out is to spend a day in each others shoes, no matter if theyre too-small, too-big, or high-heeled.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When the kids find out that Moms life hasnt panned out exactly as shed hoped, they try to make her day a bit easier by taking on her chores. However, they accidentally grab her bucket list instead of her to-do list and end up attempting to tick off all of Nicoles life goals.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom wins Employee of the Month at the Rainbow factory, Richard feels like he is never celebrated for all the work he does at home. programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. It is time for the annual Winter Creeklympics, and the Stump Kids are doing everything they can to win a gold medal at them for the first time - however, when every new event sees them seem to get farther and farther away from winning anything, the group ultimately learn that it is better to have fun than simply take all the glory.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. Craig builds a "snowme" and convinces Kelsey and JP to do the same - this results in some interesting new houses as Bobby joins in the fun, but they soon decide that they need to get jobs to maintain their new lifestyles. Feeling that they are overworked, they decide to fight back against their "boss" - an inflatable clown - but then into more trouble...

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. Craig is on his own when he discovers an abandoned playhouse in the middle of a frozen lake and ends up running into his rival Wildernessa - the pair end up bickering and arguing over their differing views when they are left stranded after the lake ice breaks, but a huddle in the playhouse to escape the cold proves to be highly beneficial for the duo.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. Elder Con comes to the Creek and the Stump Kids are excited - Craig befriends a fellow fan but ends up in a trivia battle with her over a cup, Kelsey sets up a booth and tries to sell her book but has trouble getting any customers, and JP tries to get into a screening room but encounters obstacles - when he finally enters, he discovers something unusual...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Chef brings in some old toys from his childhood and he, Duncan and Gwen get magically sucked into the toys and need to find a way to get back into their own bodies.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput spends the day at the beach, and, in a pair of swimming trunks, cuts a fine figure indeed. That is to say; a small, round and blobby figure. It only takes one snide comment from a fellow beach-goer to bring Lamputs body issues to the surface. When youre a shape changer, though, theres no need for exercise; before long Lamput is strutting along as an orange amalgam of all the best-looking sunbakers. On the up side, its a handy disguise when the Docs come a-hunting. On the down side? Well, its kind of tiring pretending to be someone youre not. Lamput learns an important lesson from a nearby blobby little girl. Be yourself, and if anyones got a problem with that, they can go find their own patch of sand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Total DramaRama

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Richards got a motorcycle helmet stuck on his head, so when he goes into a bank the terrified staff all assume hes there to rob the place and hand over a load of cash. Richard leaves with the money, completely oblivious to the fact hes just performed a stick-up. Nicole and the kids soon tell him what hes done and try to figure out a way to avoid the police manhunt and return the cash.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Leslies petals begin falling off he feels like his good looks are fading, Gumball and Darwin use everything they know about style and beauty to try and help him. The only problem is they know nothing about style or beauty. As Gumball and Darwins methods become more extreme, Leslie questions whether hes prepared to make the ultimate sacrifice for beauty.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons fear the worst when they are summoned to a Town Hall meeting, but are pleasantly surprised when theyre offered a brand new house. Until they discover its in a different state! programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs run out of puff and decide to cut some corners. All it takes is a sharpie, as it happens; just change a wanted poster to offer a huge reward, and bingo! The public are gonna do your work for you. Weirdly quickly, a hard-boiled granny shows up with Lamput under her arm. Things turn ugly when she actually expects to be paid the reward. Most unreasonable. Not even an odd-jobs montage can pay this giant bill; the Docs get desperate and turn to crime, which works about as well for them as it usually does. Specs and Skinny end up in the clink, the granny pockets a heap of cash, and Lamput is yet again the one that got away.

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ellas super excited to check out the Orion flare stars with her family. Shes been looking forward to it for weeks. But when Madhu asks a favour and Slippy calls her for help, Ella cant say no and might miss the festival entirely! Can she use science to get there in time?

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys excited to try out his new Rocket Boosters. Hes so excited that he overloads them and becomes stranded on a dangerous moon with Madhu. Its up to Ella to jog Madhus memory so they can find the right moon and save Slippy!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella

programme.title: Toad and Friends

programme.desc: The weasels hear of Toads fear of scarecrows and use this to frighten Toad out of Toad Hall for good.

programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr Bean

He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort "win" her over.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings find a vase with a genie inside that will make anyones dreams come true if they only let him out by rubbing the vase. programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings get their hands on a secret weapon that belongs to the Canadian Army: anyone hit with it becomes non-violent. Actors: Pierre-Alain de Garrigues, Josselin Charier, . Director: Victor Moulin,. F

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When they discover a super fun app that allows you to see yourself as a rabbit or a robot or else decked out with lots of animated accessories, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the tablet. But if they insist on arguing and refuse to share their virtual costumes, they could end up smashing each others faces in for real.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When they find an old book on traditional Japanese origami, the Lemmings churn out paper birds to play gliding games. Grizzy realizes that he could make the gorgeous butterfly on the cover for his beloved she-bear. But to make the Lemmings bow to his authority, he will first have to become a true origami master.

programme.desc: Kai and Finn must prevent the cinemas destruction during a fight between Pop Shock and Bubbles, caused by poor-quality popcorn.

programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.sub-title: Where Theres a Will Theres a Wraith
programme.desc: Animated adventure series following Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred as they travel around on what could be their final summer break together. Its a classic haunted house caper when a rich man whose life Scooby once saved writes Scooby into his will - however, in order to collect his share of the fortune, the gang must spend a night in a creepy mansion with the rich mans kooky relatives and a spooky phantom!

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!

Actors: Grey Griffin, Matthew Lillard, Kate Micucci, .

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs spot Lamput in the audience of a magic show and try to catch him. The chase takes them backstage where Lamput evades the Docs with the help of different magic contraptions until Specs and Skinny unknowingly ends up on stage. They become reluctant assistants to the Magician who is about to perform some death-defying tricks - with the help of the Docs!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs, Lamput stumbles into a hole in the ground, which leads in an underground civilization with a large tribe in it! Lamput gets misunderstood as the Chosen One according to the tribes prophecy. The tribe hails Lamput as the prophet and this proves to be a huge challenge for the Docs to catch Lamput, now that Lamput is surrounded by worshippers and guards at all times!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are in the mountains, doing mountainy things. They look through their binoculars and see Lamput in the distance, doing his own mountainy things. GET HIM! After a dramatic chase across the mountain range, Lamput escapes into a cave and the Docs pursue, but its no ordinary cave. Its the home of a very grumpy dragon who loves his beauty sleep! The Docs are captured and Lamput has to come to the rescue to save the day. Luckily for him, his new forest buddies and his specular musical skills might just help in coming up with a solution.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput to a haunted mansion populated by ghosts, monsters and all things spooky. Lamput makes quick friends with a ghost prince who happens to be the lord of the mansion, but the Docs run into much less friendlier characters while trying to catch Lamput.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Now that Catwoman has equipped Kitty with wings, Batwing tries to teach the easily-distracted Kitty how to fly.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Buff trains with Batwing to improve his gracefulness and uses her lessons on a delicate mission against Riddler.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice loathes injustice and never hesitates to call someone out on it. But while defending the Cards against the Queen, she finds out that standing up to the powers that be can sometimes have negative consequences: shes now banished from Wonderland!! In an effort to get Her Majesty to cancel her punishment and change the way she treats her subjects, Alice teaches Lewis and the Cards a method of fighting back that is completely foreign to the Wonderlanders: going on strike! Sometimes, safety in numbers really is the way to go!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Its Painting Day today and everyone is to make a picture of the Queen! Delighted at being a part of it, Alice grabs some art materials from the Twins caravan. Except, she picks up absorbent paint by mistake, and, a few brush strokes later, the Queen winds up imprisoned inside Alices canvas! Alice feels so bad, so she and her friends do everything in their power to find a way to get Queeny out of there, before she gets stuck inside the picture for eternity!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: The kids are making a quilt for Barneys birthday featuring their favorite things to do with Barney. David has a hard time choosing just one thing, so Baby Bop and Billy help him decide just in time for the party.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mel discovers the sunglasses she found belong to Grady, she still wants to keep them. Barney creates a high- seas adventure, where Mel realizes shes acting like a pirate taking what doesnt belong to her and returns the glasses.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Like a big brother Jerry gets a sleepy Tuffy out of bed makes them both breakfast gets Tuffy cleaned up puts on his backpack and scoots him past the mean ol cat to the house next door where Winston waits greeting his students a gaggle of mice including Jerry. They each hand their kindly teacher a treat as they take their seats on little spools of thread ready for the start of class. Winston is teaching his students the basics of force and motion and today theyre going on a field trip to see physics in action. They end up at Toms house where Tom bears the brunt of the school load until he gets a little tutoring himself.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom who chooses instead to use the mouses down time to taunt the little guy and eat all of his favorite treats. Jerry resorts to help from Uncle Pecos who, after trying a few Texas remedies, mixes a home brewed Texas tonic to knock the cold p-p-p-plum out. As a side effect of the Tabasco fueled brew, the mouse is breathing fire within minutes. When Tom catches the same cold and gets a dose of the brew, its an all-out flame war! Good thing Uncle Pecos is there to put the fire out!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry have made a connection between a variety of different cases involving the mysterious disappearance of household items -- all including a sighting of a supernaturally cute kitten. Tom and Jerry are on the case! Their investigation reveals a litter of hardened kitten con artists who are using the items theyve taken to form a makeshift home. These kitty criminals are just looking for a home but they dont want to be separated!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks hes pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Toms wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom. / A Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year. / Butch spots a dolled up Toodles heading his way! / Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves. / Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing, Tom is writing a novel. Its a mystery novel. Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger is in charge of taking care of her mothers bird. Tom tries his hardest to keep from eating the bird but cant control himself. He gets kicked out by Ginger and feels guilty. Tom and Jerry work together to keep the bird safe from Butch.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares - with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match - only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput has escaped yet again, and yet again, Specs and Skinny are in serious trouble with the Boss. Hes so fed up with their constant failure that he hires an out-of-towner: a super cool, hi-tech Doc who has all the moves and the attitude to match. The new guys hip to all of Lamputs tricks, and before long, the shape shifting blob is safely back at the Lab. Specs and Skinny, robbed of their whole gig, end up on the streets, while Rival Doc gets all the glory. With glory comes blame, though, and when Lamput stages yet another signature crafty escape, the Boss turns all his fury on Rival Doc. Who hired this guy, anyway!? Lamput just wants things to be how they were. The orange blob helps the Docs get back their jobs at the Lab, Rival Doc is sent packing, and Lamput prepares yet another daring escape.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: The kids are making a quilt for Barneys birthday featuring their favorite things to do with Barney. David has a hard time choosing just one thing, so Baby Bop and Billy help him decide just in time for the party.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mel discovers the sunglasses she found belong to Grady, she still wants to keep them. Barney creates a high- seas adventure, where Mel realizes shes acting like a pirate taking what doesnt belong to her and returns the glasses.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: In order to get her confiscated skateboard back from the Queen (her aunt), Dinah must give her the "perfect gift." Easy peasy: it just so happens that Lewis has a gift-making machine! Having said that, in order to manufacture the gift, the girl must use objects that match the Queens tastes. And since Dinah is in such a hurry to get her skateboard back, she neglects this fact, making the situation even worse. So much so that the Queen says shell keep the skateboard forever! But with Alice and Lewis help, Dinah learns more about her aunt, enabling her to come up with a gift the monarch really likes, and retrieve her precious skateboard as a result.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: After skidding out of control, the Queen loses her crown a little too long for comfort: as per the official rules, this deprives her de facto of her royal powers. At least now the tables can be turned: she can step into the shoes of her subjects, for once, and find out what its like to be a commoner. Or at least thats what Alice is planning: unbeknownst to Lewis, she has hidden the precious crown on purpose: this little life lesson will do the Queen the world of good!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom gains control of the Batcaves giant T-Rex, MOE creates a giant Bat-robot to stop the marauding dinosaur.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom gains control of the Batcaves giant T-Rex, MOE creates a giant Bat-robot to stop the marauding dinosaur.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: On a trip to Japan to visit Velmas friend, the gang comes face to face with the ancient crab monster, Kaniaku, and attempts to solve a 700 year-old mystery. Meanwhile, Daphne accidentally becomes a viral media sensation in Japan!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs at a small sea side town, Lamput meets a lonely sea monster. Lamput attempts to help the sea monster makes friends but all his plans backfires. Now the locals are enraged, and the docs take the opportunity to stir up an angry mob to take down the creature and catch Lamput in the process! Not unless Lamputs new friend has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs latest invention generates identical versions of themselves and create a whole mob of "Duplicate" Specs and Skinnies to catch Lamput! However, the device becomes faulty, and the Duplicates cant be turned off. Now the Docs are stuck with annoying copies of themselves who are turning their lives upside down!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they dont. The honeymoon suite is like nothing theyve ever seen; the Docs sheen of respectability quickly evaporates when theres robes to wear and beds to jump on. Their taste of the good life doesnt last long, though; another Lamput chase results in a proper trashed hotel room, just like you read about. Then downstairs for some à la carte chaos in the hotel restaurant. Its bad news for the Docs when the tab comes due; a Lab wage wont cover these extras.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput into the darkest jungle, where they have a go at the literal oldest trick in the book: a covered pit trap. Why these guys think this will work is anyones guess. Meanwhile Lamputs facing a whole different challenge: a lost baby elephant is looking for her mama, and seems to have a knack for getting in all kinds of trouble along the way. Lamput and the baby elephant do eventually find the mama pachyderm - with help from the Docs. And their stupid pit trap. Yet again these guys have caught more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but cant escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Beans mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to "break" his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landladys vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that its rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food. Irritated, the Lemmings scheme to remove the bear from the castle during his nap and prevent him from ever returning. Furious at being banished, the bear prepares his revenge, armed with a catapult.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: With a ring that lets their astral bodies travel, the Lemmings decide to haunt Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a giant jelly cake. Their chase leads them to the castle library, where the Lemmings accidentally activate the opening of a secret passage. The hidden room conceals numerous volumes of magic books. When opened, each book makes the story content or characters appear in real life. The bear and the rodents covet the same work: one with dessert recipes!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert. In the closet, the rodents discover a card that enables them to teleport the magic piece of furniture. They free themselves and recover the cake out from under the stunned bears nose. Grizzy understands that hes been tricked, but will he let things go at that?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.sub-title: The Bear, the Frog and the Mosquito
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of harmless green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him in vain. / Grizzy comes home to the cabin and discovers the super fired-up Lemmings dancing madly to the sound of the ghetto blaster. / A confrontation between Grizzy and the Lemmings leads to a room in the castle tower. The bear accidentally sets off a mechanism and discovers a large medieval magic trunk.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy comes home to the cabin and discovers the super fired-up Lemmings dancing madly to the sound of the ghetto blaster. The Lemmings are thrown out into the jungle where they meet a parrot that can reproduce any sound identically. The bird becomes their ally to distract Grizzy and recover their musical equipment, but the mission foils and the gadget breaks. A microprocessor falls out and sticks to the bird, who starts picking up musical waves!

programme.title: Superthings Rivals of Kaboom, Kazoom Power
programme.desc: The Kazoom Kids and Skatestar must stop Rolloxtreme to protect the location Enigmas secret base.

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.sub-title: Where Theres a Will Theres a Wraith
programme.desc: Animated adventure series following Shaggy, Scooby, Velma, Daphne and Fred as they travel around on what could be their final summer break together. Its a classic haunted house caper when a rich man whose life Scooby once saved writes Scooby into his will - however, in order to collect his share of the fortune, the gang must spend a night in a creepy mansion with the rich mans kooky relatives and a spooky phantom!

programme.title: Ole ikka lahe, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Its a classic haunted house caper when a rich man, whose life Scooby once saved, writes Scooby into his will! Now he must spend a night in a creepy mansion. / Shaggy and Scooby discover their new favourite food as the gang investigates the mystery of a frightening sorcerer whos haunting a snack factory! Actors: Grey Griffin, Matthew Lillard, Kate Micucci, .

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat, but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van. But by the time he gets to the front of the queue the ice-cream man has gone to lunch. Bean takes it upon himself to climb through in an open window and into the back of the van from where he starts to help himself. Unfortunately he soon attracts a crowd and is forced to serve a long queue of kids until all the ice cream runs out. When the ice-cream man comes back from lunch and drives away he is unaware that Bean is still hiding in the back of his van en route to the ice cream factory.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on… a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats. But the Lemmings new personality makes them particularly overbearing.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Nothing seems to be biting Grizzys fishing rod and the bear is in despair. Suddenly he spots a fabulous swordfish swimming in the lagoon. The bear is already licking his chops, when he sees the Lemmings straddling the fish in a rodeo game. From inside the cabin he uses as a mooring post, Grizzy manages to snare the swordfish and is about to pull it in, but the Lemmings are riding it toward the high seas. Each party tugs hard. And the cabin starts to slide…

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that several drops of Tabasco sauce poured into a rock fault releases powerful sprays of steam that propel them high into the sky on a pot lid. Except that the entire volcanic island shudders each time the drops are poured. Grizzy, who has decided to take a nap in his hammock, confiscates the bottle before realizing that the Lemmings have an entire stock !

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: After losing one of his wheels on his way to stop Prank, Bam comically attempts to replace his tire with all sorts of zany objects while chasing the prankster van around the city.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Buff takes down Riddler with an impressive wheel slam move, the Batwheels give him the nickname Tough Buff.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song and need to learn to harmonise to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When a group of alley dogs aided by a heroic stray are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Jestah injures herself preparing for an extreme sports competition with the other Zoomers, Bibi helps her overcome her fear of going to the mechanic so she can heal up and compete.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When it starts to rain outside, Porky hopes to show The Looney Builders that they can still have fun inside by building a fort.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a castle for Elmer the Giant. They admire his toys and use them without his permission.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Fosse Ferret hires The Looney Builders to build a stage for the kids dance recital.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has a new friend - a Seagull but sometimes friends can overstay their welcome. / Mr Bean tries to get some muscles but attempts a shortcut to physical perfection. / Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. / Mr Bean becomes a taxi driver after being locked in a taxi.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Beans plan seems to be working - until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irmas admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean tries to get some muscles but attempts a shortcut to physical perfection. / Mr Bean has a new friend - a Seagull but sometimes friends can overstay their welcome. / Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too. / Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they arent very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When a probe arrives from Madhus sibling, our gang sets off to find something amazingly special to send back! But despite their incredible adventure to obtain some super cool moon water - Madhu realizes the most special "thing" they have isnt a thing at all...

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Slippys attempts to impress his cousins with constellation drawings goes awry, causing them to get lost in a nebula! As the nebula messes with their racers and gadgets, escape becomes hopeless. Its up to Ella and Madhu to find a way to guide them safely back home!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: When Space Junk smashes into their clubhouse, Ella and Slippy set off to fix the problem. While Ella wants to be rid of the junk, Slippys determined to reuse or at least recycle it. When Ella is trapped, re-using space junk may be the only way to save her!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: The gang is playing tag the Meteoroid when Glitch fails to follow Slippys instruction. He soon realises its because Glitch saw the comet hes been tracking for months! Slippy is excited - he gets to tag a comet!

programme.title: Tahtedevaheline Ella
programme.desc: Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ellas best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Priya performs a perfect triple corkscrew to everyones amazement. Ella is frustrated that she still cant nail it

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: The weasels hear of Toads fear of scarecrows and use this to frighten Toad out of Toad Hall for good. / When Toad accidentally injures Smudge, the weasels prey on his good nature to get into Toad Hall to convalesce. Nurse Toad though proves to be too much even for the wily weasels.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Ratty tries to teach Mole, Hedge and Toad the rules of poetry but loses Hedges poem in the strong wind. / Kingfisher is singing a very irritating song, to everyones annoyance. Only Chief Weasel appreciates the song because he can use it to get Tinker and Smudge to obey him.

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Kingfisher is singing a very irritating song, to everyones annoyance. Only Chief Weasel appreciates the song because he can use it to get Tinker and Smudge to obey him. But will Kingfisher now ever be able to leave the Wild Woods?

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Mole is making his winter supply of jam but its Portlys birthday and Mole very generously gives everyone a jar of jam to give to Portly for a birthday present. Soon he has none left for winter. And Portly has rather a lot of jam!

programme.title: Toad and Friends
programme.desc: Its the Midsummer Festival and everyone is contributing to it, with Badger as the master of ceremonies, the Jack of the Green. But when he finds himself trapped in his own home, how can the festival start?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. He is forced to dress up as Mrs. Wicket when Brian the Delivery Man wont deliver the chair to anyone but Mrs. Wicket. Then Brian falls in love with "her" and asks "her" out on a date. Bean accepts because hes starving hungry. How long can he keep up the deception? Long enough to fill his stomach?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Animation based on the highly popular live action series of the same name, with many of the same characters including the hapless Mr. Bean himself, his long-suffering girlfriend Irma Gobb, Teddy and the mysterious driver of the Reliant Supervan. Two new characters appear, Beans landlady Mrs Wicket and her evil one-eyed moggy Scrapper. The series features little actual dialogue, just the famous mumblings and mild slapstick.
